Description:
Location! Location! Location!
With such a close proximity to all the local amenities, including schools, Corio Shopping Centre & the Ring Road, it is an easy decision buying a property with this much potential. Just 15 minutes from Geelong CBD and jump on the Ring Road and be in Melbourne in under an hour. Currently in construction is Purnell Road Integrated Child & Family Centre right across the Road, due to be completed in the first quarter of 2020. Northern Bay College Wexford Campus (P-8) is also right at your fingertips.
On a great corner allotment of 572sqm (approx.) opportunity to extend or rebuild (STCA)
- 3 bedrooms all with built in robes
- Central family bathroom & separate toilet
- Spacious kitchen with 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, adjoining meals area with A/C
- Large light filled lounge with gas heating
- Single lock up garage
- Large backyard with garden shed
With so much potential to renovate and raise value, contact us today!
Insights: 10 Cheshire Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect for the First Home Buyer or Add to your Investment Portfolio!!
Recently renovated solid brick veneer family home comprising of three comfortable bedrooms with large built-in-robes and ceiling fans throughout. Open plan fully equipped kitchen with gas appliances, new oven and meals area, sun-filled north-facing living room with air-conditioning, new wall heater and polished floorboards throughout the main areas. Well-designed bathroom with shower over bath and separate laundry and toilet. Fabulous outdoor entertainment area with a covered pergola and a single lock up garage, situated on approx. 526m2 block. Located only moments away from the Corio Shopping Complex, medical facilities, public transport and the Ring Road. Inspection will impress.

Description:
Huge opportunity.
Nestled on a 640m2 (approx.) block within walking distance to Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, medical facilities & all major amenities within easy reach. This three bedroom home will give its lucky new owners the chance to design their own destiny. Offering huge potential to first home buyers, developers looking to expand their options in the near future (STCA) or a great opportunity to add to your property portfolio. Comprising combined kitchen/meals area with adjoining living space, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and space for two cars in the driveway. Featuring gas heating and air conditioning in the lounge, air conditioning in the kitchen, garden shed and small pergola in the enclosed backyard. Minutes drive to the Princes Highway and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne. An opportunity like this doesn't come around often so don't wait to inspect today!

Description:
Private, spacious and convenient
Beautifully presented, centrally located and low-maintenance, this home is perfect for the savvy investor, downsizer or is a great entry into the market. Upon entry, the layout offers two great sized bedrooms, both with built-in robes and easy access to the main bathroom, including a bath and separate toilet. At the rear of the home you'll find the spacious open plan living area that includes a combined lounge and dining zone, plus a modern, well-equipped kitchen, with plenty of storage, bench space, a dishwasher and a breakfast bar; perfect for those who like to entertain. An abundance of natural light enhances this bright and welcoming space, while air-conditioning and ducted heating ensures year-round comfort. The main living space looks out to your private low maintenance courtyard, where you can relax in the morning and enjoy your morning coffee and paper. A single lock-up garage with internal access completes the layout. Located close to public transport, schools and shops, while four turns will take you to the Geelong Ring Road for a quick commute to Melbourne, this home is ready for you to move in and enjoy your new, easy-care lifestyle.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Ideal Downsizer, Fab First Home or Solid Investment
This solid 3 bed, 1 bath, 2 living, 4 car brick home set on 530m2 block will suit an array of buyers.
Situated in a growth corridor of Corio, minutes to the freeway and 10 minutes to Geelong CBD.
This solid brick home is spacious and modern with stunning Hardwood flooring throughout. Comprising of a wonderful sized open plan dining / kitchen space equipped with gas 4 burner stove, SS appliances and ample cupboards. Adjacent to the kitchen is a huge oversize family room equipped with AC, ceiling fan and wonderful natural light. Making it a great space for the whole family to unwind in.
Down the hall you will find 3 great sized bedrooms all with block out blinds and BIR, the large Master with ceiling fan. The central bathroom is bright and spacious and comes with modern black fittings, full size bath, separate shower, vanity with separate toilet.
Outside you will find a neat back deck with pergola, spacious rear yard ideal for pets, children or entertaining with fantastic tall color bond fencing. There is also ample parking with a single garage at the rear plus a oversized rear shed/ work shop, with additional 2 cars in the drive way.
FEATURES
Hardwood floors
530m2 block
Split system x 2
Rent pw $300
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
An immaculate modern masterpiece.
An inspiring profile and elevated presence are the perfect introduction to this stunning newly renovated residence proudly positioned in a highly regarded location. Modern tones and a sunny personality are recurring themes throughout the home. The conveniences of the popular location are enriched by a selection of schooling options all within easy reach including public transport, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters.
Boasting spacious interior highlights such as the stunning modern kitchen with pantry, dishwasher & gas stove. The kitchen flows through to the spacious living area highlighting laminate flooring, downlights and air-conditioning.
The home comprises of three bedrooms all with new carpet flooring and ceiling fans, an updated central bathroom featuring shower, tiles and single vanity, separate laundry & toilet. Luxury extras include built in robes, air-conditioning, garden shed and an undercover alfresco area for those nights with your friends.
Renovated to meet the most demanding of needs this home really is the whole package. Be sure to get in quick an offer this good won't last long!

Description:
Rent, reside, renovate or redevelop.
Set on a large 601sqm (approx.) block and absolutely bursting with potential, this property could be your ideal first home or the perfect blank slate. Whether you're looking to break into the property market or bolster your investment portfolio, this three bedroom property ticks all the boxes.
The current home is neat and tidy and offers a light-filled lounge with split system heating and cooling for year round comfort plus an adjoining rumpus room. The combined kitchen and meals space is low maintenance and features gas cooking and plenty of storage. All three bedrooms are a good size with built in robes while the laundry and bathroom with separate toilet complete the internal floorplan. There's an undercover porch area for relaxing with a cool drink, while a 3 car carport, single garage, shed and water tank add extra convenience.
The home is set forward on the block allowing for ample room to redevelop the backyard (STCA). Located minutes from local shops, schools, the train station and bus stops, the Princes Highway and Ring Road, this property is a prized opportunity with so many options and so much potential.

Description:
Take the Step Purchase Today!
Don't miss out on this exceptional opportunity to secure this well-presented solid brick home located in the sought after location of Corio with easy access to Melbourne Hwy, moments from local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, entertainment venues and sporting facilities. Whether you are in the market to purchase your first home, grow your portfolio or looking for a development opportunity to capitalise on (STCA), this is the perfect package for you. This well- loved home comprises of 3 bedrooms, potential 4th bedroom, with a well-maintained bungalow. Perfect teenage retreat or storage. A generous family/lounge area leads to practical kitchen includes gas oven/stove, plenty of cupboard space and meals area. Bathroom consists of bath/shower, separate toilet and laundry completes this ideal property. Other features include gas ducted heating throughout, air conditioner and single carport. All this is situated on a generous 591m2 (approx). Make the most of this opportunity and contact me today!

Description:
HOME IS WHERE THE HEART IS !
This delightful family residence is situated in a quiet location, surrounded by quality homes and handy to most amenities.
Two separate living areas with very spacious formal lounge and large family/dining room that, in turn, opens to extensive paved outdoor entertainment area.
Quality kitchen boasts gas hotplates, U/B oven, pantry and ample storage and work space. Tiled bathroom, separate laundry.
Four generous bedrooms with the master bedroom including full ensuite and BIRs. Extras include ducted gas heating throughout and SS/AC in the family room.
Outside to large double garage and level, secure garden for your children and pets.
If you are an astute investor looking to add to your portfolio this property may be of interest as currently leased on a month to month basis to excellent tenants for $380 per week.
This is a quality home in a great location and well worth you making the time to inspect.

Description:
Masterfully renovated three bedroom residence.
Impressive in size, versatility and class this masterfully renovated three bedroom residence, set in a low maintenance yard offers the finest amenities within a framework of elegance. Boasting large light filled interiors the home comprises of a spacious lounge area ideal for families, as well as 3 generous bedrooms. Centrally located the impressive main bathroom comes complete with the shower, bath and single vanity. The tailored kitchen is born to meet the most demanding needs, it is both innovative and functional equipped with stone bench tops overlooking the large meals area. Step outside into your own private sanctuary, the large rear yard is sure to impress all buyers complete with large 4 car garage and double carport. Offering additional extras such as split system air-conditioning, gas heating, freshly painted throughout and much more this home has been thoroughly renovated to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle. Nestled in an established neighbourhood surrounded by multiple reserves all major amenities are within easy reach. Close by to child care facilities, primary schools and not even a 2 minute drive to the Corio Shopping Centre and Princes Highway. Also with potential for subvidision (STCA) set on a 808 m2 (approx.) block. For commuters what more could you want? Inspections are a must to truly appreciate all the detail this stunning property offers. Don't hesitate, secure this remarkable family home today.

Description:
This home ticks all the boxes.
Situated on approx. 650m2 this fabulous property is bursting with opportunities to the astute buyer. With a rent return of $355per week on a long term lease, this property offers huge investment potential and ticks all the boxes.
Comprising of a large open kitchen/dining area with adjoining large living space, 3 generous bedrooms (with BIR'S), main with walk in robe & ensuite, full main bathroom, 2 toilets, secure open car spaces, under cover alfresco and garden shed.
Other features of the home include split system heating and cooling for year round comfort, corner pantry in the kitchen adding ample storage space as well as plenty of bench space, electric roller shutters throughout, solar panels, low maintenance rear yard all enclosed securely.
Conveniently located within easy reach of Aldi, Corio Village Shopping Centre and public transport, minutes drive to Princes Hwy and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne and on the doorstep to the best coastline Australia has to offer. Don't miss out on one of Geelong fastest growing areas.

Description:
Here it is - neat as a pin and ready to move in.
Situated on a large family block of approx. 700m2 and featuring a lovely backyard, this home offers an appealing abundance of space for the whole family to enjoy together. This is definitely a home that will impress.
Comprising an open L-shaped kitchen/meals area with adjoining large living space, 4 generous bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 2 toilets and two single garages with an added garden shed and 2 water tanks.
Featuring BIRs in the bedrooms, gas central heating and separate split system A/C to keep the home at a perfect temperature throughout the year, ample cupboard space and a dishwasher in the kitchen.
Have a green thumb? Then rejoice because there's plenty of room to grow your own veggies in the already established veggie garden at the rear of the property.
Located minutes away from Corio Shopping Centre and medical suites, Princes Hwy and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne. Don't miss out on one of Geelong fastest growing areas.

Description:
Family Home To Live In Or Lease Out
This solid home, which is nestled on a 600m2 approx parcel of land, is an ideal investment or a great first home. Built to stand the test of time this home offers loads of storage throughout, 3 bedrooms all of generous proportions with built in robes plus a study. The bright lounge flows into the dining area which adjoins the functional kitchen with electric cooking & pantry. Completed with a family bathroom & large laundry, there is so much scope to rejuvenate this property & either call it home or continue to lease out. On a well-established block with oversized double garage extra work shop & established fruit trees. Set in a privately owned estate & within walking distance of local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, medical services, sporting club & transport plus easy access to the Freeway & Ring Road. Opportunities like this are harder to find, dont let this one pass.
Insights: 16 Clavus Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Updated with plenty of potential.
This fabulous property opens up endless options to the astute buyer, situated on a 575m2 (approx.) block. Offering huge potential to first home buyers, developers looking to expand their options in the near future (STCA) or a great opportunity to add to your property portfolio, this property has plenty of potential.
Comprising combined kitchen/meals area with adjoining large living space, 3 generous bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 toilet and a single carport with adjoining double garage.
Featuring BIRs in the bedrooms, reverse cycle heating and cooling and 900mm freestanding oven in the gorgeous newly renovated kitchen. At the rear of the property you can find a large open pergola ready for some TLC.
Located only minutes to Hendy Street reserve, Northern Bay College, Corio Shopping Centre and medical suites, Princes Hwy and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne and on the doorstep to the best coastline Australia has to offer. Don't miss out on one of Geelong fastest growing areas.

Description:
Renovated Home, Ready to Move In
Set in a convenient location, this lovely home has been freshly renovated throughout. It presents a great opportunity for young families and investors alike. Close to schools, shops, public transport and with easy access to Geelong Ring Road.
- Light filled spacious lounge welcomes into the home
- The great size dining area flows onto a kitchen
- New kitchen with s/steel appliances, pull-out pantry and D/W
- Three bedrooms with built in robes
- Central modern bathroom with a separate toilet
- An undercover pergola is perfect for a year-round entertainment
- Fully fenced spacious front and rear yards, 2000L water tank
- Large double garage with the workshop and a single carport
- Gas heater and reverse cycle air conditioning for comfort
- Close proximity to Corio Shopping Centre, schools and parks

Description:
Attention Investors & First Home Buyers
Situated on a versatile 536m2 (approx) allotment this 3 bed 1 bath property is the perfect opportunity for savvy investors or first home buyers looking to enter the market.
Upon entry to this home, you are greeted to the right by the central lounge zone featuring air conditioning unit and wall heater providing all year round comfort which flows easily through to the light-filled kitchen and dining that includes electric cooking facilities and abundant cupboard space.
3 good sized bedrooms, a functional main bathroom and conveniently located laundry complete this neat package.
Ideal for first home buyers looking to get their foot into the property market or take advantage of this excellent investment opportunity. Call today!
Key features:
-3 Bedroom 1 Bathroom.
-536m2 block (approx).
-Gated side access.
-Large covered alfresco/carport.
-Generous 3x6 shed.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
